name: Panic Crisis Mage Attack
description:
Panic Crisis Mage Attack is a horizontal shooter in which you play as a mage and shoot things with magic on a magical adventure at a magical castle.

Features:

  • Main scenario with 5 stages and 6 bosses
  • Epilogue scenario for players with high endurance
  • Vengeance scenario for masochistic players
  • Four difficulty settings, from Casual to Master
  • Two playable characters
